name: Syndra
reason: Syndra is a strong mage with high damage output and zone control. She can be effective against mobile mid lane champions like Ahri and Ekko.

name: Orianna
reason: Orianna is a versatile mid lane control mage who can excel in both solo and supportive roles. She has good waveclear and teamfight utility.

name: Lulu
reason: As a support, Lulu can provide strong disengage and peel for the team. She works well with a carry-focused mid laner like Ahri.

name: Morgana
reason: Morgana is a versatile support who can provide good shielding and utility against high crowd control teams. She has a strong bind/snare ability to lock down opponents.

name: Karma
reason: Karma is a flexible support who can transition into a secondary mage. Her mantra abilities give her good utility and damage output.
